title: NYT, Chicago Tribune Sue Perplexity AI As Copyright War Rages On
description: The New York Times Co. and the Chicago Tribune sued Perplexity AI Inc., saying the artificial intelligence search startup is copying and distributing their exclusive content, the latest in a wave of lawsuits against AI developers. The New York Times complaint filed on Friday says Perplexity’s “large-scale, unlawful copying and distribution” of its content threatens its reputation.
content:
The New York Times Co. and the Chicago Tribune sued Perplexity AI Inc., saying the artificial intelligence search startup is copying and distributing their exclusive content, the latest in a wave of lawsuits against AI developers.

title: Artificial Intelligence needs structure - expert
description: AS artificial intelligence (AI) continues to transform industries and economies, Southeast Asia is emerging as a critical test case for balancing AI growth, sustainability, and sovereignty. According to Lawrence Yeo, Asean Solutions Director at Hitachi Vantara, 2026 will be the year AI becomes a discipline, not an experiment.

title: AI chatbots can influence voters’ views - studies
description: PARIS — A brief conversation with a partisan artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot can influence voters’ political views, studies published on Thursday found, with evidence-backed arguments — true or not — proving particularly persuasive.
content:

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - India's AI Mission: Bridging Regional Disparities
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: China’s AI-Driven Civil-Military Fusion - A Significant Advantage, but Not the End of the War
description: China is advancing its goal of becoming a “world-class military” by investing heavily in artificial intelligence, machine learning, robotics, swarming systems, unmanned platforms, and missile technology.
content:

title: How Artificial Intelligence is Reshaping the Education Sector
description: Education is no longer about libraries and expensive academies. Today, it’s data, algorithms, and machines that help us. According to the Digital Education Council, 86% of students worldwide already use AI tools in their studies. In fact, 54% of them use them weekly. title: CEO Matthew Prince In Focus As Cloudflare Recovers From Global Disruption
description: According to Matthew Prince the era dominated by search engines is ending, suggesting the next 30 years will be shaped by artificial intelligence.
content: Internet infrastructure company Cloudflare announced on Friday that it had fully restored services after a brief outage earlier in the day that disrupted major global platforms including LinkedIn, Zoom, and several others. The incident marked the com... [1793 chars]
